prompt: Create a Terms & Conditions screen with a soft pastel theme. The app bar should have a light pink background with the title 'Terms & Conditions' in a bold, dark purple font, centered. Include a dark purple back arrow icon. The main content area should be a scrollable section with a pale lavender background, displaying the terms text in a dark gray font with 1.6 line spacing, inside a card with rounded corners and a subtle shadow. The sticky footer should contain a 'Decline' button (light pink border, dark purple text) on the left and an 'Accept' button (dark purple background, white text) on the right. Ensure generous padding and a responsive, soothing design suitable for a friendly user experience.
